title: Gabriel Munoz-Acevedo

ENFRES


Hi there! I’m a Quantitative Ecologist and Data Scientist with over 7 years of experience tackling exciting challenges in macroecology, statistical modeling, and climate change research.
While R is my go-to language, I’m also fluent in tools like Python, SQL, and JavaScript. I specialize in making data work for science, with expertise in reproducible technical reporting, CI/CD pipelines, and version control (Git). From processing large-scale biological and environmental datasets to building predictive models and managing big-data workflows, I thrive on turning complex data into actionable insights and impactful publications.
Currently, I’m a Specialist in Advanced Analytics at the Canadian Institute for Health Information (CIHI). I’m also pursuing a PhD in Biology (currently on parental leave) at Concordia University in the Community Ecology and Biogeography Lab.


Bonjour ! Je suis écologiste quantitative et spécialiste des données, avec plus de 7 ans d’expérience dans la macroécologie, la modélisation statistique et la recherche sur le changement climatique.
Bien que R soit mon langage de prédilection, je maîtrise également des outils comme Python, SQL et JavaScript. Mon expertise inclut la rédaction technique reproductible, les pipelines CI/CD et le contrôle de version (Git). J’adore transformer des ensembles de données biologiques, socieaux, et environnementales complexes en analyses exploitables, modèles prédictifs et publications scientifiques impactantes.
Actuellement, je suis spécialiste en analytique avancée à l’Institut canadien d’information sur la santé (ICIS). Je poursuis également un doctorat en biologie (actuellement en congé parental) à l’Université Concordia, dans le Laboratoire d’écologie communautaire et de biogéographie.


¡Hola! Soy Ecólogo Cuantitativo y Científico de Datos con más de 7 años de experiencia enfrentando emocionantes desafíos en macroecología, modelado estadístico e investigación sobre el cambio climático.
Aunque mi lenguaje principal es R, también domino herramientas como Python, SQL y JavaScript. Me especializo en hacer que los datos funcionen para la ciencia, con experiencia en informes técnicos reproducibles, pipelines CI/CD y control de versiones (Git). Disfruto procesando grandes conjuntos de datos biológicos, sociales, y ambientales, desarrollando modelos predictivos y gestionando flujos de trabajo de big-data para convertir datos complejos en ideas útiles y publicaciones impactantes.
Actualmente, soy Especialista en Analítica Avanzada en el Instituto Canadiense de Información sobre la Salud (CIHI). Además, estoy cursando un doctorado en Biología (actualmente en licencia parental) en la Universidad Concordia, dentro del Laboratorio de Ecología Comunitaria y Biogeografía.








PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCEEDUCATION



Canadian Institute for Health Information
Program Specialist - Advanced Analytics
April 2023 - Present | Ottawa, ON






Skills Gained:




Advanced programming in R and Python for scalable analytics.
Expertise in mentorship and team leadership for analytics projects.
Proficiency in workflow optimization and code reproducibility.
Strategic application of AI tools to enhance organizational productivity.
Scientific and technical publishing using Quarto






University of Waterloo
Teaching Assistant – School of Accounting and Finance
Sep 2023 - Dec 2023 | Waterloo, ON






Skills Gained:




Proficiency in statistical modeling and tidymodels framework.
Grading and providing constructive feedback.
Effective course management and organization.

Course Developer and Workshop Instructor
Jan 2019 - Dec 2020 | Montreal, QC






Skills Gained:




Collaboration using open-source tools like Git.
Communication and engagement with a large student audience.






Concordia University
Research Assistant / Teaching Assistant – Biology Department
April 2018 - Nov 2021 | Montreal, QC






Skills Gained:




Development of innovative ecological methodologies.
Hands-on experience with laboratory supervision and course preparation.
Analytical skills for spatial and temporal ecological data analysis.
Experience in communicating complex concepts to students.






Universiteit van Amsterdam
Research Assistant – Institute of Biodiversity and Ecosystem Dynamics
Sep 2016 - Aug 2017 | Amsterdam, NL






Skills Gained:




Development of web applications for ecological research.
Application of Natural Language Processing (NLP) for data extraction.
Global dataset compilation and data curation.
Integration of computational tools into biological research workflows.






Universidad San Francisco de Quito
Laboratory Technician – Terrestrial Zoology Lab
Oct 2013 - Nov 2014 | Quito, EC






Skills Gained:




Advanced GIS and georeferencing for species mapping.
Proficiency in museological data management.
Contribution to biodiversity assessments (IUCN Red List).
Experience in regional biodiversity conservation.






United Nations Program for Development
Consultant – Financial Sustainability of Protected Areas
Feb 2013 - Nov 2013 | Quito, EC






Skills Gained:




Development of standardized evaluation methodologies for conservation.
Integration of community perspectives into environmental policies.
Design of sustainable economic strategies for local communities.
Proficiency in policy and stakeholder engagement.
